name: Blasted Wreckage
description:
Blasted Wreckage is a text adventure side story set in the universe of the Obsidian Republic (a homebrew campaign setting I'm working on).

In this short, but sweet experience, you find yourself awakened within the wreckage of your spacecraft.  Your supplies have been stolen and you need a new ship.  Make use of your decisions and tools to survive.

Good Luck!
